website_summaries.verdict: The easy setup of this wireless doorbell makes it a winner, especially given its high level of functionality and low price.
pros: Easy to set up and use
Comes in a variety of colors to suit the style of a home
Comes with all necessary items to hang and install device
Variety of different chimes to choose from
cons: Once receiver is unplugged, it “forgets” which chime was chosen

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I super glued the clicker to a cloth ...
customer_reviews.text: As a preschool teacher I am using this in our classroom as an attention grabber to refocus when the class gets loud or wild. There is so many different tunes it plays. It works great. I super glued the clicker to a cloth pin and have it on my lanyard. It plugs it and is loud enough to be heard there is a volume control to make it a bit quieter if needed which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Found a good doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, different volume settings, can pair front and back to same sound, Battery only needed for outside button (not indoor chime),only problem is fighting with my wife over which of the 50 odd sounds to use. Bought a cheap one at the local big box store, waste of money, this one is worth spending a little more on.
customer_reviews.author: wildad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for a little over a month now and when I first set it up it worked and now it does not work every time you press the button. People come to the door pressing the doorbell we don’t even know somebody’s at the door. This is been a poor experience so far and now it doesn’t seem to work at all and now it’s past the “ return window “ so I can’t even return it or get my money back. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Keith S

customer_reviews.title: Two-time loser
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this doorbell. The first one NEVER worked (I returned), the second one stopped working after a month. I figured that with all the positive reviews I would give this doorbell a second try...what a waste of time! I’ll never buy anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sisbarro

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom management!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this doorbell to use in my classroom. I use it to let the students know when they should switch centers or as an attention getter. We love all the different bell options. I can't wait until Christmas time so I can change our doorbell to a Christmas song. I also love that it has different volume options. Both the sounds and volumes are easy to change and the doorbell is easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great wireless doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: A great wireless doorbell that is very easy to install. I plugged in the chime unit into a wall socket and used the adhesive to attach the doorbell unit beside the door outside. It's staying out so far. Just one thing...people seem to not know it's a doorbell. Weird. Maybe because it looks so modern? Not sure. I read another review where this was an issue also. I did as they suggested and wrote "ring bell" in sharpie on the doorbell. Problem solved. I don't think you can find a better wireless doorbell for the price. Tons of chimes to choose from and adjustable volume control. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: VonWong

customer_reviews.title: Don’t count on it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it since the beginning of May. It worked well for the first 2 weeks, it no longer works. I chose this one specifically because of the high ratings that it had received. I am very disappointed in the product. Should be zero stars, but I was forced to give it 1 to submit my comment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another way to use doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I used my wireless doorbell C Series in conjunction with my Dakota BBA-2500 break beam alert (  . The DCR-2500 receiver’s annunciator cannot be heard in part of my house. However the DCR-2500 has relays, 1 for each zone, that are activated when it receives an “alert” condition. So using a couple of jumper wires I connected the tact switch in the doorbell to the normally open side of the relay. An “alert” from the Dakota receiver then acts like pushing the doorbell button activating the chime that is some 200 ft away. This is an easy way to add multiple annunciator locations to the Dakota system and increase the utility of the doorbell’s wireless feature.
customer_reviews.author: Own One

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great for delivery notification
customer_reviews.text: I've got three. One for the mailbox and one for the front door. you can set each Bell to a different tone so you'll know which one has been pressed. Placed one next to a nightstand to be used by elderly family member in case of emergencies (also set with different tone). I just bought a new one for my neighbor who is vision impaired and needs to know when her packages have been delivered. I would buy them again and again they are great rain or shine. Install it and forget it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tillaface

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazingly effective attention-getter in my classroom, until it stopped working after one week. I thought it might be the battery, so I replaced it, but no luck. I'm so disappointed, because I loved the uniqueness of it for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken, just a year later!
customer_reviews.text: OK, my original review was positive. But a year later, this is no longer working. Apparently it is an "outdoor" doorbell. AND the water ruined it. I live in San DIego, CA., and it hardly EVER rains. But the inside of the doorbell was rusted and no longer working. Unreal...
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. After the original doorbell failed we got this to replace it rather than trying to figure out the issue with the wired one. This is much cheaper and quicker to install. I also like the wide range of doorbell tones. Just out of the return window it died. Don't buy this it's junk. Nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: filter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Works well.  So easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: This wireless doorbell works well. Very easy to set up with transmitter and receiver already paired. I added a battery powered, second receiver to put on the second floor - very easy to pair with existing transmitter, and it works well too. The instructions were excellent. I could have gotten my old, wired doorbell repaired for four times the cost, but this choice was a no-brainer for us. My hearing is somewhat diminished, so having a working doorbell with ample volume options is a real plus. And I can take the extra battery operated receiver into the basement if I'm expecting someone to stop buy.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 6 months, then stopped working. Loved it in the beginning and had many wonderful tones/songs to choose from. Sadly you get what you pay for, it’s now a piece of junk headed for the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work from the Start
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in the receiver and listened to the sound choices and adjusted the volume, but when i tried using the transmitter I couldn't get it to transmit to the receiver less than 5 feet away. I tried removing and putting the battery back in but that had no effect. Either the unit was defective or the battery was bad. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: d0740

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my classroom to get the attention of my students. After two days of using, it, it is only working 1/2 of the time. I have been able to continue using it only after holding the front and back together with a rubberband. I am overall disappointed with the quality and value of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not Loud on Highest Volume
customer_reviews.text: Very POOR Volume. Volume stated at 110 db on the highest setting. I live in a 5th wheel trailer with a sliding door in the center. When I close the door I have to strain to here it ring in the other room. Images of how loud things are says that 110 db is like a snow blower of a car horn. Not way is this door bell as loud as a snow blower or a car horn.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few weeks/months
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this purchase. This is the second doorbell I have bought. I use as an attention getter in my classroom. I first door bell I purchased stopped working after a few weeks. I contacted the company and I was given directions to reset, but nothing worked. I became frustrated with the emails back and forth and just bought a new doorbell - same model, same company. I figured it was just bad luck and I would give it another shot. The second one stopped working again. This time after a few months. I will not be buying a third. Very disappointed with my purchase and I will be looking into other doorbell companies for my classroom use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this six months ago. According to the manufacturer the batteries should be good for six months if rung 10 times daily. It has been rung exactly TWICE over a six month period and is now dead. Not a very good track record!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Bush

customer_reviews.title: It’s so awesome. Ya super tiny and it’s works great
customer_reviews.text: It’s so awesome. Ya super tiny and it’s works great. I have a 1 bedroom apartment and this is perfect for my place. It comes with different chimes and the volume is adjustable. I wouldn’t use this for a house cause it’s not loud enough for that, but small places it’s great. It plus into the wall so you don’t need batteries for that, but you do need one battery for the clicker. Only thing about that battery is that’s it not a standard AAA or AA. It’s some weird size, but I guess you could find it at Walgreens or Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Milton

customer_reviews.title: It Works, Almost too well
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of initial set-up to go through all of the possible doorbell sounds that are available. When you hear one you like and move on to the next one, it requires going through the entire series of sounds to get back to one selected. There are no short cuts. It is very easy to install. Simply plug the doorbell into any outlet. The button to ring it is also easy to install, but is very sensitive. Place it in such a manner that it will not be accidentally touched unintentionally, preferably about eye level. It rings loud and clear, and can’t be mistaken for other sounds. After one year it is still going strong. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Condie

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof? Seller says yes, instructions say no
customer_reviews.text: REVISED: My original 2 star rating complained that the outdoor unit, which is touted as "waterproof" in the Amazon description, may only be "weatherproof" according to the instructions. Seller was kind enough to reply with assurance that if mounted correctly the outdoor unit is waterproof and able to withstand rain. This does not explain the contradiction in specs but I've increased the rating to 4 stars and will update after a few rainstorms if necessary..
customer_reviews.author: rsky

customer_reviews.title: This doorbell works great to get the attention of 25 kindergarten students.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had initially was keeping track of the ringer but, I found that when I stuck it to a shelf instead of trying to carry it around, I stopped losing it. I also forgot how to change the ring tone, which is important at least once or twice a year, so I had locate the instructions. All in all, fantastic tool for classroom management.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Veenstra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work 99% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a very long time, and I still find people at my door and they say "well I rang the door bell!" It doesn't chime. Its plugged up right, but you have to hold the button for like 3-5 seconds for it to "reconnect?" every single time you want the chime to go off. It is not too far away from the receiver, It is not installed improperly, the battery in the button is fine, It's just a crappy product. You can't expect a stranger or even friends to sit there and hold your doorbell for 3-5 seconds everytime they ring. Just stupid, not worth it, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is easy to set up -- which is a major factor for me. Choice of 8,297,065 ringtones (okay, maybe not that many, but a lot). Here are two thing that kept me from giving 5 stars in every category: 1. There are 4 volume levels, which is great However, the loudest isn't super loud, and I would have preferred a slightly louder top choice. 2. The provide double sided foam tape for mounting the button. I would have preferred being able to mount with screws or something more solid. Neither of those were terribly problematic, nonetheless, they are things that would have made this device perfec t for me. Even so, I'd rate it as excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Laren Bright

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong, 3 years after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I first got my house, and thought it would be a temporary thing, however, here we are about 3 years later and this is still going with the original battery. It's probably been saved because though it is outside, it's not in the rain. The sound is loud when needed and I enjoyed the options of ring. I think this is best for a smaller space (I have a small house and can hear it fine throughout, but may be a problem for those who have bigger abodes). You still can't beat the durability and ease that comes with using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annabannanna

customer_reviews.title: BEST CLASSROOM PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item midway through the school year. It was an amazing tool to assist in my classroom management. I'm excited to use it again during the upcoming school year. If you're a teacher, please INVEST! This tool will be an absolute game changer. No more attention getters using your voice. I plugged in the doorbell at the back of the room. It can clearly be heard around my entire classroom. I didn't attach the button to anything. I just leave it on my desk or carry it around with me during the class time. Best product ever. Hope this lasts me years. If not, I'll happily purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Albert

customer_reviews.title: Good Doorbell with Good Volume
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these wireless doorbells. They are exactly what I needed for a large house with thick walls. The range of the signal is great, they were easy to set different rings for different entrances, and they could not have been easier to install. I especially like the 2-sided adhesive for installation without harming beautiful 200- year-old mill work. All are installed under porch roofs in a marine environment, but I do not know how they will stand up outside since they have only been in use for one week. These doorbells seem to be good quality for the money. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Stop Yelling for Family Members
customer_reviews.text: When we moved my teenage son downstairs I had no way to get his attention without yelling down to him. I have bad knees and can't "do" stairs. This works perfectly when I want to get my son's attention without yelling through the house, disrupting everyone else. He hears the doorbell and knows he has been "summoned" to come upstairs for his marching orders. ;) Wake up, come to dinner, please help me with this, the button is always right at my side and the range is wonderful. My son likes to change the different sounds occasionally to shake things up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WIRELESS DOOR BELL OUT THERE!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I have been searching for YEARS for a doorbell that would work wirelessly. I tried so many, that I eventually gave up...... until I bought this great door bell. I couldn't believe how EASY it was to set up. I literally plugged it in, stuck the actual door bell outside and VOILA! IT WORKED! I know, how can I get so excited about a doorbell?. Probably because I tried soooooo many in the past. All I can say is your search is over. I will probably buy a few more for my other properties. Very satisfied and I would definitely recommend this product. This is not a phony review - I did purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with older chimes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 2015 version of the same doorbell that had died. The original had two receivers (chimes) in different parts of the house, so I figured I would now have three receivers. Wrong. Apparently, they updated them in 2017 so that they could be paired: before then they were on a fixed frequency which does not work with the new transmitter (doorbell). I trashed the old chimes and bought a second one which works fine, but ended up paying almost double what I had expected to pay. Havin said that, it's still a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Rings at any time
customer_reviews.text: I liked this doorbell for the first year. Easy to install and worked great. The second year it would ring one bell in the middle of the night. Then sometimes during the day. Changed battery. Still does it. Put the button and the doorbell inside and it still goes off. Not the selected chime. Just a singe bell. Gotta throw it away because it wakes the wife at night. Not good for my health to have a grumpy wife!
customer_reviews.author: wccsteve

customer_reviews.title: The SadoTech Wireless Doorbell is Sleek and Easy to Setup!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with my SadoTech Wireless Door Bell. The setup is very easy because SadoTech gives you everything you need to install with either double-stick tape or screws....your choice. Then just plug the transmitter in the wall and you’re all set. I love the sleek design as well as as the attractive oval that you push to activate the doorbell. Most important, the doorbell comes with a range of bell tones and volume levels so you can set to a level that meets your needs. I am really happy with my purchase and you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Sadotech sent a new one
customer_reviews.text: This wireless doorbell set is stylish and was easy to install. The receiver offers a huge variety of ring-tones (although no way to add your own), but, the sound quality isn't great - the "tones" are rather distorted. The reliability of the system decreased over time, and even after I replaced the battery in the transmitter (button), it stopped working almost completely. SadoTech sent me a new one for S&H of $6.99, and the new one works well - perhaps even better than the first one when it was new. Here's hoping it still works well in a year! --Gary
customer_reviews.author: gdavisloop

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This unit was very small, but effective Pro's: - Easy to install and adjust volume/ring tone - compact packaging, the box was 3"x3"x2" - no waste - Includes screws or sticky tape for install - Can move the receiver very far from the transmitter. Con's: - Instructions super small writing, I'm too old to read w/o glasses We are installing in an indoor hallway to the condo unit. This is much smaller and better designed than the one it is replacing. I expect it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Snobot

customer_reviews.title: Great song variety
customer_reviews.text: It works great, and there are plenty of chimes. There's bound to be one that you like at least a little. ;-) I hear it plenty loud from upstairs through closed doors, so they did a great job with the volume. I also like the feature that allows you to listen to the different chimes without it changing the one you've currently set it to. It was super easy to set up and we've had no doorbell problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Adams

customer_reviews.title: easy to install but not as loud
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to install and seems to have weather the sun and the few rain we get in southern california. Just be warn if you get white, it will start to change color if it's in the sun. The real big downside is the volume. I put this things to max and you can't hear it upstairs. Have the door close, forget about it. My house is only about 1300sqf, so that that big, still had hard time hearing it. Oh and if you have pets, kids, or guest over and accidentally knock it out of power socket there goes any possibly of hearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Quest

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a day, getting trashed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a day, getting trashed. Literally 40 feet from the receiver and maybe reacts every 50 presses of the transmitter, get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Edward Estrella

customer_reviews.title: It worked great until it didn't!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom and raved about it. The sound was loud, I love the different rings. It worked very well as an attention getter. A month later it stopped working. I thought it was just the battery on the remote. I replaced the battery. Still not working. Wish I can find a replacement remote without buying the whole thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-April

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wireless doorbell as well as 2 more for a couple of my neighbors who wanted one as well. I had a problem with mine and needed to reset it. I received instruction from Sado Tech on how to do this and all is well. My neighbors love their's too. I love the variety of songs/tones and it's very easy to hear it no matter where I am. This is a great product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Buffett

customer_reviews.title: Look Ma, no wires!
customer_reviews.text: A battery-powered doorbell-button sends some sort of wireless signal (Bluetooth?) to the ringer, plugged into an AC outlet anywhere in the house. No wires at all! Really easy to install. The ring unit has multiple different rather electronic-sounding chimes, but it's not easy to review your choices or select the one you want. The ring unit does let you pick one of four levels of loudness. Cautions: When the battery runs down, your doorbell won't work. Keep a spare battery.
customer_reviews.author: P. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Simple, well designed and functional.....
customer_reviews.text: I live in Puerto Rico where the houses are poured concrete with rebar reinforcement, usually about 9" thick as this is an earthquake zone... this is not very permeable to radio energy of any type. All of my previous wireless doorbells had to have almost a line-of-sight to work. I'm so happy to find a reasonably priced, attractively designed, and adjustable unit that works throughout my house even in the back patio. Kudos to the engineers and designers of this combo and my "thanks" for doing their jobs so competently.
customer_reviews.author: Homer Dorton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Our wired doorbell stopped working due to a wiring problem somewhere between the transformer and the ringer. I read the reviews for this wireless unit and bought it. After receiving it, we hooked it up and found some sour notes being played when we tested it. I read the instructions again about resetting the unit so we did, chose a different chime pattern and now the unit is working properly. This ringer was well worth the price and beats having to climb into the attic to run new wiring. We like it and I’m happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Installed at my job. Gets used at least 100 times per day. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older doorbell system on a locked nursing unit. It works great. 50+ tones to choose from, easy to set up, and staff can hear it on the entire unit. Adjustable volume is a plus, just wish they could go one more level higher volume in the workplace. It has been installed for months now and has had no issues to date. Plugged it into the wall, and it probably gets used about 100 times per day from 6am to 12am, so it is definitely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Young

customer_reviews.title: Not weather Proof, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: So this is not a water proof model and it broke on it when it rained hard. That being said, the customer service department seen my original review and sent me a new device that works great and is supposed to be water proof. I’ll bump them up to a 4 star for customer service but I’ll take it back down if it breaks too.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Cole

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different bell before this one. The old bell after a few days went crazy. When someone pressed the outside button, the bell would not shut off, even if I pulled it out of its socket and replugged it. The chimes would intersect so there was a lot of discordant noise going on. I garbaged it and bought the SadoTech bell which was a few dollars more expensive. The Sadotech works beautifully every time. Had it for a month now. I recommend it very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrij Witiuk

customer_reviews.title: Great to finally have a working doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why we waited so long to buy a replacement doorbell! I finally took the bull by the horns and bought this model. I wanted this model because we use it for one door. It’s supposed to work in very in cold weather and is waterproof. It has several chimes to choose from, and my husband was thrilled with how easy it was to install. It’s battery is supposed to be long lasting; we’ll see about that. But if you need one bell this is the perfect one for you.
customer_reviews.author: CooperGirl 52

customer_reviews.title: Do recommend, Works fabulously, and Would refer friends and family to it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a front-doorbell. The best doorbell I've had there- the place is a wifi dead zone. But the simple remote works brilliantly. It's intuitive and simple to set up. It can ring quite loudly, too. You'll almost certainly find a ring that you''ll like. They take some time to cycle through. They even have seasonal options that you can change if that's your spirit. A number of them are Christmas songs. Frankly, I don't think you need THAT MANY rings. A number of them are Christmas songs. I suppose I'm just not proactive/lively enough to want to have a large segment of Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer as my doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Nonelectric doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doorbell for my elderly neighbor because the old electric doorbell stopped working. Living on a fixed income, she could not afford to have the old one fixed. The Sado Tech doorbell was the perfect option. I was initially cautious about the quality and workability because it was just too simple to install. After several weeks, the doorbell continues to work great. My neighbor was able to adjust the volume and chime. She loves it. Her family was impressed with the doorbell when they visited recently.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: When a product works really well , just as advertised, or really bad, I believe a review is in order. This wireless door bell works really well. My wife picked out the chime she liked and the volume, then we trained it. It got its first test a few days ago when we had a thunder storm that passed right over us. One review I had read stated that if power was interrupted the chosen chime changed when power was restored. Our power was off and on numerous times but the chime of choice did not change. We are also quite pleased tieh the clear tone. So, do we recommend it to others? Yes indeed.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to battery powered doorbells
customer_reviews.text: Originally got a battery operated replacement for my mom, which ate expensive batteries like breathing air. I felt awful for getting that for her, so I needed to find something better. This has been just the ticket. She can move the doorbell anywhere she wants so she can hear it better and even change it to festive holiday jingles throughout the year. She taped the instructions to the inside of her kitchen cabinet in case we forget how to change the melody (which I do every time lol), so that's been really helpful, too
customer_reviews.author: MAC P.

customer_reviews.title: Great little doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd wireless doorbell by SadoTech. I bought my first one back in 2014. It just went out. I was amazed how long these little doorbells last. And for the price they are great quality at a great price. I would recommend these to anyone. The only thing I didn't like is that I couldn't get the free extra gift that comes with your purchase once you register your product. They were out of stock. But other than that it wasn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a great battery operated doorbell for those who do not have a hardwired door bell. Very easy to install. Outside transmitter can be mounted either with the supplied backing tape, screwed to doorframe or house with the supplied screws and anchor mounts. Comes with a battery and ready to use. Range and volume control very good. Although it has 52 different chimes, we like the sound that was pre programmed. We also like that the transmitter lights up when pressed letting someone know the doorbell is working. Although the receiver also lights up, where we have it placed, we never see that. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Met our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo easy. we needed to replace our other doorbell system. Every time I had to resync or change the batteries, out came the ladder. This product plugs into an outlet..no batteries...no ladder! The push bell came with anchors, screws and adhesive tape. AWESOME! I was able to use one of the existing holes in the outside wall and use the tape, no additional screw hole necessary ...the tape is very high quality. Love the product, don't think twice about getting it. So affordable and convenient ..what more do you need.
customer_reviews.author: np

customer_reviews.title: Expansion option very limited
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit 1 year ago. I had to use a different adhesive to get it to adhere but that was no big deal. I went to add on a motion sensor so I could tell when someone pulled into my driveway (as advertised on the product description - expandable with "up to 20 additional buttons, receivers or sensors") but was told it is not an option for this unit. I am not out $20 and need to look again for a product that can meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Indoor apt doorbell
customer_reviews.text: We often did not know there were packages in front of our inside apartment door. So we put this door bell up with the Velcro tape. NO WIRING NEEDED. Works GREAT! You can adjust the volume too. I added a clear label to the door bell, as the UPS guy didn't know what it was I guess. LOL Now he rings!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement wireless doorbell
customer_reviews.text: The range on this doorbell is great! You can mount the doorbell button at your front door and plug the doorbell in any outlet of the house and it'll still ring. You may still want to plug it into an outlet near the door. If the person at your door can't hear the doorbell ring, they may think your doorbell is broken. If you plug the doorbell speaker into the bottom outlet, you'll still have access to the top outlet. Selecting the doorbell tone or song was very intuitive, but setting the doorbell tone to the doorbell button was not. I had to read the directions. So I took a star off for the user experience.
customer_reviews.author: A. Asuncion

customer_reviews.title: It works sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: First, I thought it was great. Very easy to install, and be able to adjust the loudness and tune. I used the adhesive tape to put it on the wall. When my husband came home and tried it, it didn’t work. I checked everything but it didn’t work. Decided to return. While I was detaching the unit from the wall, it started work again. It wasn’t expensive and too much hustle to return when you supposed not to go out ( covit 19) I decided to leave it there. It might work , it might not. But so far I have no visitor ... so it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: wannabe healthy

customer_reviews.title: It's loud and it works.
customer_reviews.text: It's loud, and it works--the only two things that actually matter to me in a doorbell. The outside part (the push button?) applied easily and it's maintained its stick for over a year and counting. The inside portion works well -- you plug it into an outlet, choose your chime, and move on with your life. It loses a star because the size of the internal doorbell blocks a second outlet unless your second plug is slim, so it's kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Grumplestiltskin

customer_reviews.title: Finally a clear loud door bell
customer_reviews.text: At long last a wireless doorbell that I can hear when I'm not standing right next to it. A nice clear "ding dong" that I can hear anywhere in the house. The button was easy to install and looks good and is easy for guests to find. My only concern is that the instructions recommend it be placed out of direct weather. I was not able to do that but we have had several severe storms since I installed it and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic in a school library
customer_reviews.text: My son's 3rd grade teacher uses this to get the class's attention without raising her voice. When I saw this in action, I immediately purchased one for my elementary library, which is a very large room with areas cut off by shelving. I have the volume set to the highest setting, and the doorbell is plugged in at the midway point of the room. Students throughout the library can hear the chimes and know to freeze and get quiet. It has been a lifesaver! I keep the button on my lanyard with my badge, so no matter where I am in the room, I can get everyone's attention quickly and effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had a wireless doorbell that finally failed so I bought this. It works great and has lots of possible tones you can use. The only problem is you have to cycle thru them and as far as I can tell if you decide you want an earlier one you have to cycle thru to reach it. You can't go back. That also means if you fail to pair the tone you will have to go all the way thru to get it again. However, once you get the tone you want it seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: rbpeirce

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Little Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I bought the white one because I thought that was the easiest and sleekest looking option. I live in a desert climate that can reach up to 120 degrees. It has worked through a freak rainstorm and thunderstorm we had. And it’s loud but I also love how you can control the volume. Considering my apartment did not have a doorbell to start with it was worth the 15 dollars to now be able to hear someone.
customer_reviews.author: Caty

customer_reviews.title: Good doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is easy to install and has numerous ring tone choices. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the sound quality is rather tinny. Also, you have to cycle through all 52 sounds in order to get back to one you like. I don't know how you would make that any easier, but it's kind of a pain that you can't go backwards to one you like. It works from a good distance and the volume level is good for my whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are very handy, but I should have done ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy, but I should have done more research as they are not water proof. the first night we had a thunderstorm after buying these, the doorbell started blaring after midnight and we had no idea what was going on at first. Then of course it hit me that these might not be water proof lol. Otherwise, they work perfectly (even after getting wet) and hold on tightly to fence I have posted them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko Clements

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install! Just follow the instructions, and I had two of these set up in my classroom in less than 5 minutes! I use these when students get too loud, or during review games - the kids love them and respond quickly! I have 2 in my classroom - one in the front and rear - to help with crowd control. Obviously, they'd be great as an actual doorbell, too. Just remember that they can be used for multiple purposes - think outside the box!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works great and there are plenty of different sound options. After a few months of use it suddenly stopped working. The individual parts still seemed to work but the trigger would not trigger the receiver. I fixed it by pressing down both volume control and chime selector. This will make the receiver flash, then just press the sender unit. I guess the link got lost somehow. Now it's working again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I use this to manage my classroom and love it. It’s easy to use to move my kids from one task to another. I wish I could purchase a pack of receivers in multiple colors. Right now my main one is our current song and I bought a black one for the happy Birthday song. Whenever it’s someone’s birthday we use that as the song of the day. It’s super easy to pair and change the song I just sometimes don’t have the 2 minutes to do it
customer_reviews.author: Alivia

customer_reviews.title: ADJUSTABLE volume and choice of rings.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the volume and choice of rings. Unfortunately, the self stick tape didn’t hold up the buzzer button outdoors in Hawaii’s heat but will buy a small screw-in bracket or two at the hardware store to remedy this or make one myself with soft flexible wires or flexible sheet metal-like holder and screws . Be creative and you can come up with ideas to fix this problem. Don’t let this prevent you from buying this doorbell. Well worth it,
customer_reviews.author: Pomaikai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and nice chimes.
customer_reviews.text: When I moved into a large apartment complex I did not have a doorbell. I sometimes did not hear a knock and needed something that I could hear. I purchased the wireless doorbell and it is awesome! It was so easy to install and the sound is loud and clear. Knowing that someone has left a package at your door is a plus and your family and friends don’t have to call or text to let you know they are outside your door.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Stewart

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Functional and fun. Easy to stick on any surface. Can chose any sound. I have it set for it to play "Rudolph the Red Nose Rendeer" for the holidays. Can choose I think about 50 sounds. Just stick the doorbell on an outdoor surface, plug in the other piece inside of you home and voila...you are done. Took about 10 minutes to install. And I'm not tehnical. And this time even included picking out the sound of the doorbell. So easy. Purchased because I couldn't hear when someone knocked on the door when I was in the back bedroom. Love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Diane Standish

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: Our new home has two entries and had no doorbells, so I ordered two units. The setup instructions are to the point, so within minutes I had two transmitters paired to a receiver, with a different chime per door. I put the second receiver in my back-room studio - it's apart from the main house - and paired it to the two transmitters as well. Works perfectly. My wife had been looking at conventional and more expensive electrical doorbells. I'm very happy we found the Sado Tech instead.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I need this for our receiving door at work.. Our old one gave out and I decided to try a new one that was weather resistant. This one arrived ready to go! It already had a battery in it. Took it out of the box, screwed it to the back door, plugged in the receiver and done. It's already lived through our first hurricane of the season and 110 degree heat - so far - so good! You can adjust the volume and the ring tone easily. Highly recommend if you don't need or want a wired door bell.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: The doorbell and receiver were both delivered in perfect condition. Our apartment is upstairs
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly. The doorbell and receiver were both delivered in perfect condition. Our apartment is upstairs, with the stairs being inside. Our apartment exterior is partially brick and even through the thick walls we have no problem with reception. There are so many sounds to choose from, honestly I didn't make it through all of them before I was able to find one that I liked. The doorbell itself has held strong with no movement whatsoever (granted it has not fully been exposed to rain or snow because our front door is covered). I was on the fence about purchasing this, but you really can't beat the price for the convenience and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rachell Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It's as perfect as a doorbell can be!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Honeywell model before this. The batteries kept discharging even though the doorbell got very little usage. I tried everything. It was totally useless. I finally gave up and bought this model by Sado Tech. The batteries in the receiver will not go dead because there aren't any. The unit plugs directly into an AC outlet. It is simple to set up when you CORRECTLY read the instructions. Has over 4 dozen different chimes to choose from. It's great. And on top of everything, the doorbell itself is large, unlike the Honeywell model. A far superior product at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Woods

customer_reviews.title: Loud with variety of rings
customer_reviews.text: The Sado Tech Model C wireless doorbell was a good buy for me. First of all it has a loud max volume that can be easily heard in a 1,000 square foot home. It has over 50 rings including a few melodies. It is made of plastic and appears to be well made. When you press the doorbell the ring around the button lights up blue letting you know its functioning. The receiver/bell also lights up when the door bell is pressed, which gives you a visual warning that someones at the door. Overall i recommend this product to anyone who has no existing doorbell and wants a affordable quality, quick solution.
customer_reviews.author: Laz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those with electrical challenges
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. For years our home did not have and door bell installed due to incomplete electrical work in construction and there was much discussion regarding wiring the traditional doorbell system at the front door to the home. The Sado Tech Model C provided the perfect solution to our challenge, and best of all we are able to select the ring tone. The product exceeds our expectation so much we ordered one for our office complex as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: could not change ring tone
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace a similar model that developed issues. Everything about this model was okay except that it would not change out of one sound. It was stuck on that sound when doorbell was used. I was able to run through the whole selection list. But when I whenever I settled on a different sound/ring, it would repeat the same wrong sound. I guess it you liked that one sound, all would be great.
customer_reviews.author: LWM

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But.....
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little guy, and fairly loud on the high setting. It's much smaller than expected, which is awesome. I would give 5 stars, but it's not as easy to program the sound you want as they make it seem. UPDATE: Found a YouTube video on how to program the dinger. You have to push BOTH the volume & tone select buttons on the receiver. While the receiver is flashing, quickly push the dinger and Done! The instructions included don't clearly express this step, hence why I left it at 4 stars. But it's definitely awesome!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy Birthday, and traditional bells
customer_reviews.text: I wished I bought this a couple years ago. works well and has 52 different chimes and music. It has christmas music, Happy Birthday, and traditional bells. I bought this because I don't have a doorbell and I have a frontdoor, mudroom and another front door so when people knock, I can't hear it at all they usually have to call me to let me know they are here. The doorbell receiver is position so if I am in the bathroom or living room I can clearly hear the doorbell!! I used the stick tape provided to mount to the outside of house, and it's been thru 3 rainstorms and has held up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough for my class. Chime options could be better
customer_reviews.text: I’m afraid I’m going to have to return this. It just isn’t loud enough even on the highest setting. My class isn’t super loud and they could hardly hear it. My class system is 1 chime to quiet down and 2 chimes for immediate voice level 0. I had to chime 3 xs or more for them to notice it. Also, although 52 chimes are advertised I did not like a lot of the options, many were Christmas and others were too long more like songs.
customer_reviews.author: Meche

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is a great value ... easy to install, easy access to the battery, and many sound options. I was concerned that the signal, from doorbell to receiver, would be compromised by concrete walls but it works perfectly. Our home has an open floor plan so I was also curious as to whether the volume would be appropriate for the whole house ... it is. We've had this doorbell for awhile and have been very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: A Classroom Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell lives in the front of my classroom, I keep the push button on me for when I need to get students attention (different amount of chimes meant different things). When teaching classroom procedures the doorbell was introduced. I love how seamless it has made transitions and getting their attention back after a turn and talk or free time. My only complaint would be that I had issues trying to change tones, I could never get them to stay changed. I was able to change volume level, but the tone always wanted to stay the same, which ended up being fine as the students were used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but!
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great. My only complaint is the directions in how to use it is very vague. The company needs to explain how to use it better. I figured out how to set it up on my own just by messing around with it. But it works great. It says in the instructions not to put it on a metal door or next to one. However I did and it works great. I highly recommend it. Especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick/Peart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, button broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought the door bell and received only 4 months of actual work from it. During that 4 months, we had to replace the battery once before the door bell actually broke. The button no longer depresses but the indoor sounder still works. We have attempted different batteries three times now, but the outside button no longer depresses. Super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This was inexpensive and so simple to install. When my wired doorbell in my 1937 home stopped working, I first determined the problem was probably the doorbell button. Finding a button to exactly fit in the recess of the old button proved challenging. My searches led me to this doorbell which is far superior to my old wired doorbell and is even FUN with the different ring tones. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Freda

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set up, very poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Wireless Doorbell by SadoTech as an add-on to an existing Sado doorbell system. The new units were supposed to be able to be paired with the existing system but I was never successful doing that. I was able to pair the old doorbell to the new chimes but the pairing would not last more than a few days. I attempted to get support from Sado but their only response (eventually, it took them several weeks to respond to my email) was to keep trying. I eventually purchased another brand which I am happy with so far.
customer_reviews.author: H. Whites

customer_reviews.title: Great and simple for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far this doorbell has done the trick at a very reasonable price. There are many different chimes to choose from which is nice. The chimes are loud enough to hear throughout my home although I wish there was maybe one or two more additional increases. The only negative I can think of would be the have the screw holes pre-drilled. The way it is you need to drill the screw though the back plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Izen6

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Used it in my classroom for transition times, worked perfectly! Several chimes to choose from, very easy to install. I hot glued the button to a clothespin and wear it on my lanyard. Not too bulky, doesn’t get in the way. My only mild complaint is the button is a little sensitive, so I’ve accidentally bumped it on something and had it go off, but overall it’s been a great addition!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I am recommending it to friends!
customer_reviews.text: I have an office in one of the back bedrooms in my home. I do not hear the normal doorbell ring, while I am working. I therefore put the new doorbell on the other side of the door and high up. A small sticker below it says For friends ONLY. Yesterday an electrician was coming by to install a new thermostat. He was not sure of what time. I told him to ring the white doorbell high on the right. Worked perfectly! John said he was going to buy one for his mother. She is quite deaf but will see the flashing blue light!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ttee

customer_reviews.title: Good once set up
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell has been working fine, no problems. It took a bit of effort to get it set up, holding down one button while doing something else with the other hand... I think I ended up having to plug the electric part into an extension cord so I could bring it to the door where I'd installed the pushbutton. (Once paired successfully, I moved it to a convenient outlet.) I think I would have to go through all of that again if I wanted to change the tune, which is a drag, so I just leave it the way I set it originally.
customer_reviews.author: acarter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect apartment solution
customer_reviews.text: My wireless doorbell was very easy to install and it works perfectly. Wherever I'm in my apartment, I can hear the doorbell, which has a pleasant sound. My door is one of four in a hallway, and a knock on my neighbor's door can sound like a knock on my door. With the wireless doorbell, I know for sure. If I'm in my bedroom with the door closed, the doorbell alerts me to someone at my door. I've had the doorbell for almost a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have a hearing impairment and there was no doorbell or knocker at my duplex, so when someone came over, I had to always be on the alert, keep my music off, etc. or I might miss them. So, having had portable electronic doorbells before, I knew what to look for. The SadoTech Model C Wireless Doorbell is the best one I've had so far. I like that there are different options for sounds, and the volume is loud enough to be heard over my music, but not load enough to bother my neighbor. I highly recommend this for anyone who needs a portable wireless doorbell. It's easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bastoky

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this door bell. The oversize push button outside the door and the sounding unit inside. The sounding unit needs to be plugged in, no problem for me. There is a huge selection of sounds. I found one long enough and loud enough to suit my needs. (It happens to be two choruses of Jingle Bells) I'm sure everyone will find a 'ring tone' to fulfill their wishes. 5 stars for this item. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that is safe and reliable!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product far exceeds my expectations in quality and performance. The doorbell has so many fun ring tones that you can choose. I've had this doorbell for over a year and it has effortlessly held up to constant use and even abusive weather. I also have one in my classroom that I use to use as a reminder to the students that they are getting too loud. The kids respond so well when they hear the ring and they love the surprise of a new ring tone every time I change it! Excellent product at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good little item
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to set up. Needed something quick and easy and removable, as we are in a Rental. Just plugged the receiver in and took the sticky backing off the ringer to attach to the door. I like the variety of rings to choose from. Just wish there was a slightly louder setting. When the house is absolutely quiet, I can hear the bell, but have missed a couple people who say they rang the bell and I didn't hear it at all! For the price, It was a great buy and perfect for what I needed though.
customer_reviews.author: Pengwen

customer_reviews.title: Great little doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell! We needed a doorbell that didn't require much installation and this fit the bill. Our house is stucco and this attached right to this place we had our other ringer. The transmitter is plugged in right inside the door. It has worked great since day one and the volume is where we can hear it all over our house. Love it! Great buy for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE ring my bell!
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell has had the effect of making me feel better about our culture's mad fixation on technological advances. This replaced a hard-wired unit that was old and fussy, and the hardest parts of the installation were deciding where to plug in the receiver, and which of the 52 tones to use. Well, and what to do about the now superfluous wires hanging outside our front door. Otherwise, this is a no-brainer of an improvement. Took all of 10 minutes to install and set up, and we love to show it off to visitors. SadoTech likely can expect some additional business from our friends and family, and even the occasional Morman and Jehovah Witness who stop by, albeit in vain.
customer_reviews.author: Procyonid

customer_reviews.title: perfect. Nice and loud
customer_reviews.text: Needed a second doorbell to reach the back of the house, Could not hear the original one if sitting on back porch. Used Velcro strips to attach to my siding next to the current doorbell (will make it easier to change the batteries in the future). Plugged in the receiver in an outlet near the porch door and ... perfect. Nice and loud. Maybe a few TOO many ringtones to choose from, but most choices are pleasant. The musical ones do not send my dogs into barking fits!! That is a real plus!!
customer_reviews.author: AmyAFL

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a day and then quit on me.
customer_reviews.text: Had the doorbell for my classroom. It worked for a day but then decided that it was not going to work. When I press the button it makes this puffing sound and then nothing.... Tried resetting. After reading all of the good reviews maybe I got a defect copy....
customer_reviews.author: Alex Belden
